About the Program: 
The Assurance and Advisory Management Program (AMP) is a dynamic program for individuals who are results driven and interested in further developing their career and leadership skills in an invigorating, team-oriented environment. 
 
AMP is a 2-year program, which ensures varied business exposure and development of future talent through challenging consulting/auditing rotational assignments. The mission is to deliver outstanding customer service, drive process improvement and develop future management talent. Areas of focus include: Operations, Merchandising, Finance, Supply Chain, IT, International and more. Rotational assignments are aligned with learning opportunities in leadership, Six Sigma, finance and technical/functional areas to create practical business application.
